text: “Nɨ oreghɨva, kamaghɨn fogh: Dughiar Jerusalem uam an ingaramin mɨgɨrɨgɨam otogh mangɨ 49plan azeniba gɨvaghtɨma, gumazir God en akurvaghasa mɨsevezim, an otogham. Eghtɨ me ua Jerusalemɨn ingarɨva, nguibar ekiamɨn aven tuavibar ingarɨva, afemozir ekiam gekuightɨ a nguibar ekiamɨn dɨvazir gavgavim gighuigham. Eghtɨ Jerusalem 434plan azenibar kamaghɨra ikiam, eghtɨ azenir kaba, kar osɨmtɨziba ikiamin azeniba.9:25 Gumazir maba ghaze, e kamaghɨn akar kam giragham, “E kamaghɨn oregh fogham, me ua Jerusalemɨn ingaramin mɨgɨrɨgɨam otoghtɨ, 7plan dughiabar, 7plan azeniba akuvaghamin dughiam ko 62plan dughiabar, 7plan azeniba akuvaghamin dughiam gɨvaghtɨ, God mɨseveghamin gumazir ekiar kam otogham. Dughiar kamɨn, me ua Jerusalemɨn ingarɨva, nguibar ekiamɨn aven tuavibar ingarɨva, egh ua afemozir ekiam gekuightɨ a nguibar ekiamɨn dɨvazir gavgavim gighuigham. Eghtɨ azenir kaba, osɨmtɨziba itir azenibar mɨn ikiam.”
